    Experience

    Experience
    Senior Project Manager
    ABC Productiony
    April 2016 - Present (2 YEARS)
    Dallas, TX
    I study how the design, affordances and choice architectures on digital screens affect users' behavior, thought patterns, relationships and general wellbeing. And using the intersection of behavioral science, cognitive neuroscience, psychology, habit-formation, social systems and ethics, I help invent and advocate for new designs that embed mindfulness into the screens people use.
    A career highlight was helping to organize a meeting between Thich Nhat Hanh, international spokesperson for Mindfulness and Zen meditation, and Google's leading product designers.
    A career highlight was helping to organize a meeting between Thich Nhat Hanh, international spokesperson for Mindfulness and Zen meditation, and Google's leading product designers.
    I study how the design, affordances and choice architectures on digital screens affect users' behavior, thought patterns, relationships and general wellbeing.
